Description: Wax figure; human hair in navel; papyrus roll stuck into the back.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.46, 47. D. Ogden, "Binding spells: curse tablets and voodoo dolls," in Witchcraft and magic in Europe: Ancient Greece and Rome, Ed. B. Ankarloo and S. Clark (London 1999), fig. 5.
Exhibition history: Oct 2015, Grenoble, PCI scanning project Exhibited: 2015-2016, Oct 29-Feb 7, London, BM, G35, Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs.
